parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>DISPLAYTITLE:disableMapIndicators</title></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.82</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local</value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Difficulty </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Command allows suppressing visualization of FRIENDLY, ENEMY, MINES and/or PING map indicators from difficulty setting EXTENDED MAP CONTENT. 
</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''disableMapIndicators''' [disableFriendly,disableEnemy,disableMines,disablePing] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> disableFriendly: [[Boolean]] - true: disable visualization of friendly units </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> disableEnemy: [[Boolean]] - true: disable visualization of enemy units </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> disableMines: [[Boolean]] - true: disable visualization of mines </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> disablePing: [[Boolean]] - true: disable visualization of all tactical pings </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER4</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> Disable visualization of friendly and enemy units:<code>[[disableMapIndicators]] [true,true,false,false];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
</value></part><part><name> mp </name>=<value>  Effect is local. </value></part><part><name/>=<value> Multiplayer
</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[difficultyOption]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
